About Me

Here is a little about me...

Bio

My name is Richard Quirarte, and I am a self-taught web developer. I started teaching myself front end web development around the beginning of October 2018. There has been many trials and tribulations, but with the help of friends, Stack Overflow, and YouTube it has been a lot easier. I love to take an idea, and run with it. I am currently working on honing my react skills along with Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB/Mongoose. If you have any questions, or would like to just contact me, head over to the "How to reach me" page and my contact information will be there. I also do freelance work if you are interested, you can contact me for prices!
